entry.def: Spatial is used to describe things relating to areas.

example.ex: ...the spatial distribution of black employment and population in South Africa.
example.tran: 南非黑人就业与人口的空间分布

entry.def: Your spatial ability is your ability to see and understand the relationships between shapes, spaces, and areas.

example.ex: His manual dexterity and fine spatial skills were wasted on routine tasks.
example.tran: 他灵巧的动手能力和杰出的空间识别能力都浪费在日常事务上了。
